DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_GRAPH_SEMAFORO_STATUS
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="select 
 case
 when STATUS = 1 then 'Pendente'
 when STATUS = 2 then 'Em andamento'
 when STATUS = 3 then 'Concluido'
 end ROTULO,
 case
 when STATUS = 1 then '#E35B5A'
 when STATUS = 2 then '#F3C200'
 when STATUS = 3 then '#26C281'
 end COR,
 COUNT(HANDLE) VALOR
from K_CRM_PESSOASEMAFORO
GROUP BY status" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="ROTULO" From="A" Path="ROTULO" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> <Field Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
